resources.string: The application information is registered to the platform server to obtain the corresponding enabled capabilities
When your application has enabled RKI, you need to apply for ClientId to register with the backend to fully use the RKI capabilities.
Register the inquirer with Core, and notify third-party applications to inquire about the strategy when Core needs to update the app
Third-party applications use base stations to locate terminals
Third-party applications download the parameters configured on the cloud platform through Core
Third-party applications receive push messages from the cloud platform by registering broadcast receivers
Successfully registered the cloud messaging capability
You can view the detailed business logic in CloudMessageReceiver!\n We use static registration, you can also use dynamic registration
Third-party application query terminal firmware update related information and control
Third-party applications upload industry-specific data to the cloud platform, which can then accurately analyze the data to obtain valuable information such as industry trends.
Third-party applications integrate the hotfix support library of the manufacturer to enable online emergency and rapid repair of executable code
Third-party applications can quickly locate online problem stack information by integrating the vendor stack support library, and the cloud platform can perform intelligent code analysis on it.
RKI provides a secure and reliable remote key injection management system
Please check the CloudMessageReceiver cloud message type distribution download key.
Cannot get information from STORE client, Please install STORE client first.
Please allow the current APP to display windows on other applications.
